def inv_mod(a, p):
    # è®¡ç®— a^(-1) mod p
    return pow(a, -1, p)

def point_add(P, Q, a, p):

        return Q
    if Q == "O":
        return P

    x1, y1 = P
    x2, y2 = Q

    if x1 == x2 and y1 != y2:

        m = ((y2 - y1) * inv_mod(x2 - x1, p)) % p
    else:
        m = ((3 * x1**2 + a) * inv_mod(2 * y1, p)) % p

    x3 = (m**2 - x1 - x2) % p
    y3 = (m * (x1 - x3) - y1) % p

    return (x3, y3)

    Q = point_add(Q, G, a, p)

def inverse_mod(k, p):
    """è®¡ç®— k åœ¨ mod p ä¸‹çš„ä¹˜æ³•é€†å…ƒ"""
    return pow(k, -1, p)

def point_add(P, Q, a, p):
    """æ¤­åœ†æ›²çº¿åŠ æ³•æ“ä½œ"""
    if P == "O":
        return Q
    if Q == "O":
        return P

    x1, y1 = P
    x2, y2 = Q

    if x1 == x2 and y1 != y2:
        return "O"

    if P != Q:
        m = ((y2 - y1) * inverse_mod(x2 - x1, p)) % p
    else:
        m = ((3 * x1**2 + a) * inverse_mod(2 * y1, p)) % p

    x3 = (m**2 - x1 - x2) % p
    y3 = (m * (x1 - x3) - y1) % p

    return (x3, y3)

def scalar_mult(k, P, a, p):
    """æ¤­åœ†æ›²çº¿ç‚¹ä¹˜ï¼ˆæ ‡é‡ä¹˜æ³•ï¼‰"""
    R = "O"
    while k > 0:
        if k & 1:
            R = point_add(R, P, a, p)
        P = point_add(P, P, a, p)
        k >>= 1
    return R

import hashlib
from random import randint

# å“ˆå¸Œå‡½æ•°
def sha256(msg):
    return int(hashlib.sha256(msg.encode()).hexdigest(), 16)

# æ¨¡é€†è¿ç®—
def inverse_mod(k, p):
    if k == 0:
        raise ZeroDivisionError("æ¨¡é€†ä¸å­˜åœ¨")
    return pow(k, -1, p)

# ç‚¹åŠ æ³•
def point_add(P, Q, a, p):
    if P == (None, None): return Q
    if Q == (None, None): return P
    x1, y1 = P
    x2, y2 = Q

    if x1 == x2 and (y1 != y2 or y1 == 0):
        return (None, None)

    if x1 == x2:
        m = (3 * x1 * x1 + a) * inverse_mod(2 * y1, p)
    else:
        m = (y2 - y1) * inverse_mod(x2 - x1, p)
    m %= p

    x3 = (m * m - x1 - x2) % p
    y3 = (m * (x1 - x3) - y1) % p
    return (x3, y3)

# æ ‡é‡ä¹˜æ³•
def scalar_mult(k, P, a, p):
    R = (None, None)
    while k > 0:
        if k & 1:
            R = point_add(R, P, a, p)
        P = point_add(P, P, a, p)
        k >>= 1
    return R

# ECDSA ç­¾å
def ecdsa_sign(msg, d, G, a, p, n):
    e = sha256(msg)
    while True:
        k = randint(1, n - 1)
        R = scalar_mult(k, G, a, p)
        if R == (None, None):
            continue
        r = R[0] % n
        if r == 0:
            continue
        k_inv = inverse_mod(k, n)
        s = (k_inv * (e + d * r)) % n
        if s == 0:
            continue
        return (r, s)

# ECDSA éªŒè¯
def ecdsa_verify(msg, signature, Q, G, a, p, n):
    r, s = signature
    if not (1 <= r < n and 1 <= s < n):
        return False
    e = sha256(msg)
    w = inverse_mod(s, n)
    u1 = (e * w) % n
    u2 = (r * w) % n
    P = point_add(scalar_mult(u1, G, a, p), scalar_mult(u2, Q, a, p), a, p)
    if P == (None, None):
        return False
    return (P[0] % n) == r

import hashlib
from random import randint

# å“ˆå¸Œå‡½æ•°
def sha256(msg):
    return int(hashlib.sha256(msg.encode()).hexdigest(), 16)

# æ¨¡é€†è¿ç®—
def inverse_mod(k, p):
    if k == 0:
        raise ZeroDivisionError("æ¨¡é€†ä¸å­˜åœ¨")
    return pow(k, -1, p)

# ç‚¹åŠ æ³•
def point_add(P, Q, a, p):
    if P == (None, None): return Q
    if Q == (None, None): return P
    x1, y1 = P
    x2, y2 = Q

    if x1 == x2 and (y1 != y2 or y1 == 0):
        return (None, None)

    if x1 == x2:
        m = (3 * x1 * x1 + a) * inverse_mod(2 * y1, p)
    else:
        m = (y2 - y1) * inverse_mod(x2 - x1, p)
    m %= p

    x3 = (m * m - x1 - x2) % p
    y3 = (m * (x1 - x3) - y1) % p
    return (x3, y3)

# æ ‡é‡ä¹˜æ³•
def scalar_mult(k, P, a, p):
    R = (None, None)
    while k > 0:
        if k & 1:
            R = point_add(R, P, a, p)
        P = point_add(P, P, a, p)
        k >>= 1
    return R

# ECDSA ç­¾å
def ecdsa_sign(msg, d, G, a, p, n):
    e = sha256(msg)
    while True:
        k = randint(1, n - 1)
        R = scalar_mult(k, G, a, p)
        if R == (None, None):
            continue
        r = R[0] % n
        if r == 0:
            continue
        k_inv = inverse_mod(k, n)
        s = (k_inv * (e + d * r)) % n
        if s == 0:
            continue
        return (r, s)

# ECDSA éªŒè¯
def ecdsa_verify(msg, signature, Q, G, a, p, n):
    r, s = signature
    if not (1 <= r < n and 1 <= s < n):
        return False
    e = sha256(msg)
    w = inverse_mod(s, n)
    u1 = (e * w) % n
    u2 = (r * w) % n
    P = point_add(scalar_mult(u1, G, a, p), scalar_mult(u2, Q, a, p), a, p)
    if P == (None, None):
        return False
    return (P[0] % n) == r

p = 97

# ç§é’¥ & å…¬é’¥

# ç­¾åæ¶ˆæ¯

# éªŒè¯ç­¾å

print(f" éªŒè¯ç­¾åç»“æœ: {'æœ‰æ•ˆ' if valid else 'æ— æ•ˆ'}")
